snippet.title: AuroraRL Gameplay Impressions - Xcom Research and Crafting Meets Space Exploration!
snippet.description:
AuroraRL Gameplay with Splat! Let's Play AuroraRL and check out a game that's rapidly becoming a favorite! In AuroraRL you explore space and craft gear to survive in a harsh void!

Download auroraRL : http://store.steampowered.com/app/437890/AuroraRL/
My Twitch Stream : Twitch.tv/splattercatgaming
The Nerd Castle on Steam : http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Splattercat
Twitter : https://twitter.com/SplattrCatGames
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/SplattercatGaming
Support The Nerd Castle on Patreon : www.patreon.com/splattercat
Steam Curator : http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Splattercat#curation

Fan Submissions :

Vacaville CA 95696
